DOC.detailed_description: According CDC , screen GBS colonization implement , early onset GBS disease occur rate 1.5-2 per 1,000 live birth . Antibiotic treatment GBS colonize woman accord guideline recommend American College Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) decrease risk early onset neonatal GBS infection 10 fold . Unfortunately , many eligible woman n't receive full treatment protocol . Although rate early onset infection low , newborn group B strep positive woman receive recommend preventative antibiotic must undergo test extended observation . This study determine level antibiotic umbilical vein cord blood newborn infant administration penicillin orally labor compare level level penicillin umbilical vein cord blood patient treat intravenous penicillin labor . Comparisons do literature ; intravenous penicillin administration arm study .
